item.title: How to include a screenshot in Github README
item.author: Author
item.description: A picture is worth 1000 words. Working with github repos, sometimes you want to include a screenshot in your repos. Today I’ll help you getting this done in one step. Go to your repo page and click on issues. Click new issue Take a screenshot you wanna add and paste it there using Control + V or whatever you like. You will get a link once the screenshot is uploaded. Just copy it and paste it in your README.
